markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Shootist Bandolier](/Equipment.aspx?ID=937)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Abomination Vaults</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 73</row>

**Price** 1 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This leather bandolier holds up to three repeating hand crossbow magazines in leather pockets that pop open with the quick flick of a thumb. You reduce the reload time for a [repeating hand crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=160) magazine from the bandolier by 1, to a total of 2 actions. You can wear only one shootist bandolier at a time.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Shootist Bandolier
